actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-278.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2832) to provide for increased participation by the United States in the Inter-American Development Bank, the Asian Development Bank, and the African Development Fund.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2832 (development bank participation).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2832) to provide for increased participation by the United States in the Inter-American Development Bank, the Asian Development Bank, and the African Development Fund.
